metadata.name: Mermaid's Bathroom
metadata.description:
Don’t you know mermaid also need a bathroom? 

Even though we live under the sea, there are some moments that’s we also want to relax and take a dip in the tub.

How lucky that these humans can do something like this everyday.

3000 x 4003 pixel
300 dpi
Illustration by Paerytopia
